## About the project

### üõ† Technologies

- [Next.JS](https://nextjs.org/)

### üé≤ Run

```bash
# Clone this repository
$ git clone https://github.com/NaathanFerreira/trcbooking.git
# Access the project folder on terminal/cmd
$ cd trcbooking
# Install dependencies
$ yarn
# or
$ npm install
# Start json-server
$ yarn server
#or
$ npm run server
# Start the application
$ yarn start
# or
$ npm start
```
